title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the Average of Outback Steakhouse sales unit from 2015 to 2018 .
As of 2018 , there were 3580 sales unit .
gold: This statistic shows the average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the United States from 2015 to 2018.
Average sales per Outback Steakhouse restaurant amounted to approximately 3.58 million U.S. dollars in 2018 .
